name: Rover (Aidan)
description:
Rover is the result of my October One Game a Month challenge.

It is a very stripped-down strategy game, where you can only control what structures to build and when. Energy is generated constantly by your solar panels, and are consumed by building each structure. Barracks will spawn Rovers that automatically seek out and attack the enemy base.

Rover was built in Godot and all of the assets were created in AssetForge.
